name: roliboli
description:
roliboli is a short game about bringing a snowman their hat back.

control a cute head with your mouse and roll all the way across to complete every snowman :>

there's a hat to grab on the way to make them happier.
each level has its twist and you'll have to be careful if you want to get to the end.

_____________________________________________________________
CONTROLS

Move with your mouse
if you're stuck you can pass a level with the arrow keys
